scripts.build: npm run build-locales && npm run build-firefox && npm run build-chrome && npm run build-apple && npm run build-android && npm run build-windows && npm run build-integration && npm run build-chrome-mv3
scripts.build-locales: mkdir -p build/locales && node scripts/buildLocales src/locales/click-to-load > build/locales/ctl-locales.js
scripts.build-firefox: mkdir -p build/firefox/ && node scripts/inject.js firefox > build/firefox/inject.js
scripts.build-chrome: mkdir -p build/chrome/ && node scripts/inject.js chrome > build/chrome/inject.js
scripts.build-chrome-mv3: mkdir -p build/chrome-mv3/ && node scripts/inject.js chrome-mv3 > build/chrome-mv3/inject.js
scripts.build-android: mkdir -p build/android/ && node scripts/inject.js android > build/android/contentScope.js
scripts.build-windows: mkdir -p build/windows/ && node scripts/inject.js windows > build/windows/contentScope.js
scripts.build-integration: mkdir -p build/integration/ && node scripts/inject.js integration > build/integration/contentScope.js && npm run copy-build-integration
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run lint-no-output-globals && npm run test-unit && npm run test-int
